column1: '''LEP''' is a [[Common Eldarin]]<!-- We usually write "Primitive Quendian"
column2: but since the source spec. says "Common Eldarin"
Phrases and Passages in ''The Lord of the Rings''" (late 1950
column3: early 1960s) appears the root LEPEN (or LENEP)
column4: yielding the derivatives Quenya ''[[lempe]]'' and Sindarin ''[[leben]]''.<ref>{{PE|17}}

column1: In the ''[[The Etymologies|Etymologies]]'' (ca. [[1937]]) appears the root LEP-
In the ''Gnomish Lexicon'' (ca. [[1917]]) appears the root ''lef-''
In the ''Qenya Lexicon'' (ca. [[1915]]) appears the root LEPE
